channel.title: File path? ...?
channel.description:
Okay, so i was following a tut on this site, and i have 1 problem with it. It says this:
loaditemsearch("item.cfg");
Be sure to replace "item.cfg" with the name or path of your item.cfg.
What does this mean? What is the path or name of my item.cfg
I've tried "item", "item.cfg", "*.cfg", and i've also tried to put "c:\blah blah\blah blah\ blah blah\ blah blah\item.cfg"
But back slashes "aren't alowd" in the quotes or w.e

item.title: File path? ...?
item.dc:creator: @dadancinman dadancinman
item.description:
@dadancinman wrote:

Okay, so i was following a tut on this site, and i have 1 problem with it.
It says this:

loaditemsearch(“item.cfg”);

Be sure to replace “item.cfg” with the name or path of your item.cfg.

What does this mean? What is the path or name of my item.cfg

I’ve tried “item”, “item.cfg”, “*.cfg”, and i’ve also tried to put “c:\blah blah\blah blah\ blah blah\ blah blah\item.cfg”

But back slashes “aren’t alowd” in the quotes or w.e

Read full topic
